title: Doubt regarding counceling
content: I got  1670 and I took cse in ec I want to change it to aiml in rr is it possible

comments.body:
https://preview.redd.it/je02zept916f1.png?width=988&format=png&auto=webp&s=dee49732957c53a5becb8d52a0c61b701e1a98da

btw, when will i be able to do this
U can in round two, but why downgrade from cse to aiml?
cAuSe Rr Is SuPeRiOr CaMpUs BrO
hey can i apply now? it is closed on website it says last date to apply is in july but it also says that first round is conducted for jee mains scorer
i mean, it is, in terms of student/company you will have?
Dude I got 92%ile in jm and is it beneficial to apply in counselling. I want CSE or specialisation in RR campus. Is there any seats left for round 2? (My HS is Delhi btw)
yeah, you can apply for round 2. keep checking regularly for when the portal opens.
try for cse first in rr or ecc, i would say apply, why not?

Brother will get because there is no past year cutoffs based on jm. Still I will surely do. 
I wanted to know that placement % is 85% so it is like they allow every student (around 1400) to sit or like other clg they eliminate by cgpa and attendance criteria and allow only 1/2 or 2/3 of the batch size?

P.S-Don't mind me asking because in Delhi all these top Pvt clg hype there placement and I don't know the condition of BLR.PES will be costly for me (around 25-27L) so I'm little concerned.

PES cse placements are very good tbh, the gpa cutoff is 6.75 ( 90% cross it, its very easy to cross this tbh) so most of the batch does sit for placements.   
The JEE quota is pure merit ( 50% seats i think), KCET quota is government control so it has reservation.
